source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Paint Realistic Watercolour and Botanicals - MAGNOLIAS

visible_instructors.name: Heidi
visible_instructors.title: Heidi Willis
visible_instructors.job_title: Renowned Watercolor Artist and Art Tutor

items.headline: Washes, glazing, texture, divine elegance and beauty... the Magnolia is a 'MUST PAINT' subject for any botanical artist
objectives_summary: At the end of my course, students will have created a beautiful Magnolia painting in watercolour for themselves
Students will have an expanded knowledge and feel of the watercolour medium in general
Students will have an improved understanding of how to create critical textural effects relevant to the Magnolia subject

items.title: OIL PAINTING FROM BEGINNER TO MASTER
items.headline: HOW TO PAINT FROM BEGINNER TO MASTER
objectives_summary: A process and structure to painting a still life from start to finish, that’s easy for anyone to manage!
You’ll learn what the best supplies mediums and cleaners to buy and how to use them. As well as what steps ta take to prepare a painting
How to mix a 10 value greyscale, shading and how to make a gradient in every value with paint.

items.title: The Pen and Ink Experience
items.headline: An Exploration Of Drawing With Ink
objectives_summary: Apply ink using various techniques and methods
Use technical pens and traditional dip pens to create pen and ink drawings
Apply ink wash to create gradations of value and tone

items.title: Portrait Drawing 101 - Pencil Drawing Course for Beginners
items.headline: Step by Step Instructions on How to Draw an Engaging Portrait - Impress Your Friends & Family W/ Your Drawing!
objectives_summary: Drawing an appealing realistic portrait of a woman's face
How to draw the head from any angle
How to draw each facial feature (the eye, the nose, the ear, the mouth)

items.title: Acrylic Painting for Beginners
items.headline: The Complete Guide to Your First Acrylic Painting
objectives_summary: What acrylic materials to purchase
How to prepare yourself for acrylic painting
A good understanding of color, value and composition

items.title: Amplify your shading skills
items.headline: Excellent techniques to become better at shading
objectives_summary: After completing this course, students will gain confidence with their shading abilities.

items.title: Cold Process Soap Making #2 - Natural Colours & Ingredients

visible_instructors.name: Shona
visible_instructors.title: Shona O'Connor
visible_instructors.job_title: Crafter, Maker of Soap, Hair, Bath and Body, Trainer

items.headline: Taking You Beyond Basic Soap Making Using Alternative Techniques & Natural Ingredients - Expand Your Soap Making Skills
objectives_summary: You will be able to create your own recipes using a range of natural ingredients, to make fabulous, attractive looking soap with skin nourishing properties.
You will be able to master the technique of adding goat’s milk and other milks to your soap without it discoloring or scorching.
You will know how to use plant based colours and other natural colorants, to create a subtle natural look in your soap.

items.title: How To Craft Wire Tree Sculptures With Andy Elliott

visible_instructors.name: Andy
visible_instructors.title: Andy Elliott
visible_instructors.job_title: Artist that specializes in crafting wire tree sculptures

items.headline: Twisting Wire To Create Beauty
objectives_summary: Learn the technique of crafting a wire tree sculpture
Learn what materials and tools are needed

items.title: Become an Arabic Calligraphy Artist from Scratch
items.headline: An 8-week comprehensive and step-by-step course to learn the Naskh, Thuluth, and Diwani scripts from absolute scratch.
objectives_summary: By the end of the course, you will be able to script and design your own Arabic Calligraphic artwork
In this course, you will learn the Naskh, Thuluth, and Diwani calligraphic scripts

items.title: Developing an Eye for Landscape Composition

visible_instructors.name: Jill
visible_instructors.title: Jill Poyerd
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist and Fine Arts Educator

items.headline: Learn to successfully see a landscape when painting in oil, watercolor, or acrylic or in photographic compositions.
objectives_summary: Break down the landscape into manageable broad planes.
Understand what differentiates landscape from other subject matter.
Identify the focal point in a landscape scene.

items.title: The Advanced Guide to Digital Art with Procreate on iPad!
items.headline: Learn creative tips, art techniques, little-known gestures, & shortcuts for this powerful digital art app for iPad!
objectives_summary: You'll learn that Procreate's tools are more powerful than most realize!
You'll learn tons of tips, little-known tricks, and shortcuts for this amazing iPad app.
You'll learn creative ways to use selections, layer masks, filters, adjustments, and a lot more!

items.title: Mastering Brushstrokes - Part 2

visible_instructors.name: Jill
visible_instructors.title: Jill Poyerd
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist and Fine Arts Educator

items.headline: Master key brushstrokes that lie at the core of watercolor, oil, and acrylic painting.
objectives_summary: Gain a thorough understanding of a broad range of brushstrokes
Develop a broad toolbox of strokes for reference when creating works of art
Learn how each brushstroke impacts form

items.title: Watercolor Painting For Beginners I Techniques & Effects
items.headline: By Award Winning Artist I Taking Beginner Watercolor Painters To The Next Level I Wet On Wet Watercolor Painting
objectives_summary: Use water as a tool, not just to mix your paints or rinse your brushes with
Learn the difference between Wet on Dry and Wet on Wet painting
Learn my 4 new Wet on Wet techniques that you can look forward to

items.title: Essential Watercolor Skills: Paint Your Own Awesome Artwork

visible_instructors.name: Robert
visible_instructors.title: Robert Joyner
visible_instructors.job_title: Learn To Paint Loose With Acrylics & Watercolor

items.headline: Master The Unique Qualities Of Watercolor Painting
objectives_summary: Master the essential watercolor skills that will unlock the potential of the medium.

items.title: Mini Mandala Tutorial-How to draw a Mandala ( Beginner )

visible_instructors.name: Anike
visible_instructors.title: Anike , Zebra Soul Art
visible_instructors.job_title: Art Therapist B.A., Instructor, Creative Entrepreneur

items.headline: Drawing a Mandala can help you relax and unwind. Learn simples steps to draw your own DIY Mandala
objectives_summary: How to draw a simple Mandala
How to draw a DIY Mandala from scratch
How to draw a structured Mandala

items.title: The Ultimate Acrylic Painting Course

visible_instructors.name: Nancy
visible_instructors.title: Nancy Reyner
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Painter, International Author & Art Instructor

items.headline: Achieve Acrylic Mastery. The only acrylic course you'll ever need
objectives_summary: Professional and easy-to-follow videos show you all the ways to use acrylic with hundreds of painting tips to get successful results.
Learn traditional painting methods such as glazing, stippling, color mixing and dry brushing.
Achieve new contemporary special effects with techniques such as flinging, pouring, and sanding.
